attributes.additional_details:
I believe the public need a serious threat if they commit a crime of murder
That being a death sentence
I think this will make people think again about carry a knife or any other weapon if the penalty is severe 
Jail sentence is not enough 
Let’s be honest a modern jail sentence appears to be a luxury, no bills to be paid, hot food provided, recreational activities- this ain’t punishment 

People need to have fear that if they commit this crime it is life or death
attributes.background: I would like to introduce a death sentence for any persons committing murder

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions, which call for similar action:

"Hold a referendum on the re-introduction of capital punishment for murder"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750935

"Capital punishment for those convicted of terrorism, murder or intentional harm"
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/737624
